name: image
description: An image that is related to the action that someone should take.

name: heading
description: A heading that describes an action that someone should take.

name: description
description: A couple of sentences that provide more information about the action that someone should take.

name: button_text
description: The button text that describes the call to action the user should take.

name: button_link
description: The URL that a user should be taken to when they click the button.

name: anchor
description: An anchor id for the call to action section
